Text: ik kan de file mounten maar vlc speler speelt bestand niet af. Bestand uitpakken lukt ook niet. kan iemand mij helpen?
Hello, I downloaded this and it was an ISO image. When I burned the image with roxio, it burned as a data disc, and not a dvd. Why is this and how can I burn the image as a DVD?

Minameise

Try using nero burning rom

oke 
1.  extract the .ISO file with winrar.
2.  open the folder en goto BDMV -> STREAM
3.  open 00000 with VLC media player.

for subtitel:
go to video -> subtitels tracks -> [your choice]

:D enjoy
